pages.text: Parapeytoia is a megacheiran arthropod from the Cambrian period. It is know from preserved frontal appendages and its body comprised of many smaller appendages and it possessed 8 body segments. It was likely to have been a benthic feeder.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
